thread.title: Very Very Expensive bad burger
thread.title_full: Very Very Expensive bad burger - Review of Eight Restaurant, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Paul F
title: Very Very Expensive bad burger
text: We ordered the hamburger on the menu which was one of the cheapest items on the burger at R147. Supposed to be THE Gourmet burger with handcut chips. What a disgrace. A complete ripoff. Costing on that burger not more than R20 but sold for R147. Dry, no butter on buns, no sauce, THE WORST Bacon ever. Sloppy gray chips. never again Spier
